text:
@narendramodi Due to the rising in the COVID19 cases entrance exam like Jee Main and Neet 2020 should be postponed NOT cancelled. As we have been preparing and as a dropper student it puts our career at stake. So kindly don't cancel the exam but you can postpone it.@DrRPNishank
@HRDMinistry
